Text messages sent from Neymar to former colleagues at Barcelona helped convince Frenkie De Jong to reject Paris Saint-German and sign for the Catalan club.

According to Spanish daily AS , De Jong was shown a series of messages from the Brazil star as he weighed up whether to leave Ajax for Paris or Barcelona .


In the messages Neymar reportedly complained about the level of competition PSG face in France, the combativeness of their Ligue 1 rivals and the weather, while he admitted he had made a mistake in leaving Barcelona.

De Jong had spoken to both PSG and Manchester City , but decided to shun their advances and signed a contract with the Spanish champions earlier this week.

replies.msg:
The departure of Denis Suarez of FC Barcelona is about to be official and the Galician midfielder will travel on Wednesday to London to enlist in the ranks of his new team, Arsenal . The player will leave on loan just after renewing for the club azulgrana and some of his colleagues and began to say goodbye through social networks.

It was the case of Luis Suárez , who published an image in his Instagram stories in which he wished the "galleguito" good luck in his new adventure. The case is that the Uruguayan striker deleted the publication at the time of having done it since he was possibly informed that Denis's departure was not official, but the capture was already circulating through the networks and later it was republished.

It was the case of Luis Suárez , who published an image in his Instagram stories in which he wished the "galleguito" good luck in his new adventure. The case is that the Uruguayan striker deleted the publication at the time of having done it since he was possibly informed that Denis's departure was not official, but the capture was already circulating through the networks and later it was republished.
